text: Lace cuff it's the name they receive some type of cuffs crafted with lace or embroidery techniques. Especially the embroidered cuffs of the ceremonial garments. == Use == They are used as a complement to various ceremonial garments, both by individuals belonging to the clerical establishment : deacons, priests or bishops, as well as in the civil sphere ( magistrates, judges, etc.) or academics, vgr. doctors, rectors and other university personalities. Within the university clothing, the colors of the cuff will vary depending on the faculty or position of the academic. == References == Category:Cloth Category:Textile arts
title: Lace cuff
